Application server implements unexpected version of Java Servlet API Specification. Expected version: . Actual version: .

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. System administration issue detected. The system property , which defines the location of the runtime properties file, cannot be read due to a security restriction.
The system property , which defines the location of the runtime properties file, is not set. No runtime properties are available.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is not set.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is set to , but that class cannot be loaded.

XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property , which defines the name of the API class, is set to , but that class is considered invalid as an API class. Reason: .
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is missing.
XINS/Java Server Framework cannot be bootstrapped. Invalid application package. The build property is set to , which is considered an invalid value. Reason:
